mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CONVENIENCE_FOOD.CONVENIENCE_FOOD_ID, CONVENIENCE_FOOD.CONVENIENCE_ID, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_ID, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_TYPE, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_NAME, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_PRICE, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_AVG_RATING, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_REVIEW_CNT, CONVENIENCE_FOOD.FOOD_AMOUNT, IMG_FOOD.IMG_FOOD_PATH FROM CONVENIENCE_FOOD INNER JOIN FOOD_LIST ON FOOD_LIST.FOOD_ID = CONVENIENCE_FOOD.FOOD_ID INNER JOIN IMG_FOOD ON IMG_FOOD.FOOD_ID = FOOD_LIST.FOOD_ID

SELECT DISTINCT CONVENIENCE_FOOD.CONVENIENCE_FOOD_ID, CONVENIENCE_FOOD.CONVENIENCE_ID, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_ID, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_TYPE, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_NAME, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_PRICE, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_AVG_RATING, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_REVIEW_CNT, CONVENIENCE_FOOD.FOOD_AMOUNT, IMG_FOOD.IMG_FOOD_PATH FROM CONVENIENCE_FOOD INNER JOIN FOOD_LIST ON FOOD_LIST.FOOD_ID = CONVENIENCE_FOOD.FOOD_ID INNER JOIN IMG_FOOD ON IMG_FOOD.FOOD_ID = CONVENIENCE_FOOD.FOOD_ID WHERE CONVENIENCE_ID = #{convenienceId} ORDER BY CONVENIENCE_FOOD_ID DESC

SELECT DISTINCT CONVENIENCE_FOOD.CONVENIENCE_FOOD_ID, CONVENIENCE_FOOD.CONVENIENCE_ID, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_ID, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_TYPE, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_NAME, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_PRICE, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_PROTEIN, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_FAT, FOOD_LIST.FOOD_CARB, CONVENIENCE_FOOD.FOOD_AMOUNT FROM CONVENIENCE_FOOD INNER JOIN FOOD_LIST ON FOOD_LIST.FOOD_ID = CONVENIENCE_FOOD.FOOD_ID INNER JOIN IMG_FOOD ON IMG_FOOD.FOOD_ID = FOOD_LIST.FOOD_ID WHERE CONVENIENCE_FOOD.FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CONVENIENCE_FOOD WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId} AND CONVENIENCE_ID = #{convenienceId}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS result FROM DUAL
